description.message: Take over browser's new tab settings and open another configurable URL

avoidStd.message: Should not specify a standard new tab URL here. Otherwise a new tab would reload itself endlessly

noExtension.message: Didn't find the extension whose ID is "$1".

connectionFail.message: Can not connect to the extension: "$1".

addID.message: Please add this extension ID to $1's allow list

injectionFail.message: The extension $1 accepted but injection failed.

notSupported.message: The target extension $1 is not supported.

o3.message: Focus web page when creating a new tab.

o4_2.message: Open target URL in a same container (group).
